messages.subject: Q4 Budget Review - Action Required
messages.snippet: Hi, I need the Q4 budget review completed by Friday. This is critical for our board meeting next week.
messages.body:
Hi,

I need the Q4 budget review completed by Friday. This is critical for our board meeting next week.

Please include:
- Marketing spend analysis
- Development team costs
- Revenue projections

Let me know if you need any clarification.

Thanks,
Boss

messages.subject: Meeting Follow-up: Mobile App Design
messages.snippet: Following up on our meeting today. I've attached the updated mobile app designs for your review.
messages.body:
Hi,

Following up on our meeting today. I've attached the updated mobile app designs for your review.

Key changes:
- Updated color scheme
- Improved navigation flow
- Added new features from our discussion

Please review and let me know your thoughts by Wednesday.

Best,
Designer

messages.subject: Spam: You've won $1,000,000!
messages.snippet: CONGRATULATIONS! You've been selected to receive $1,000,000! Click here to claim your prize!
messages.body:
CONGRATULATIONS!

You've been selected to receive $1,000,000!

Click here to claim your prize: http://fake-spam-site.com

messages.subject: Client Feedback: Project Alpha
messages.snippet: Thank you for the excellent work on Project Alpha. The team is very happy with the results.
messages.body:
Hi,

Thank you for the excellent work on Project Alpha. The team is very happy with the results.

We particularly liked:
- The intuitive user interface
- Fast loading times
- Comprehensive documentation

We're looking forward to working on the next phase.

Best regards,
Client
